events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving vehicle collision on May 9th. Claim officially filed for processing.
The submitted claim was categorized under auto accident as the incident involved a car collision on a public road.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle this auto accident claim and will be reaching out to the claimant.
Acknowledgement sent to the claimant confirming receipt of the auto accident claim and outlining the next steps.
Request made for additional documents including police report, photos of vehicle damages, and repair estimates.
Claimant submitted all requested documents including detailed photos, police report, and repair shop estimates.
Investigation initiated by claims team to verify the details of the auto accident and assess liability.
Investigation completed confirming accident circumstances and verifying submitted documentation as accurate.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to the claimant based on assessed damage and policy terms.
Claimant responded expressing satisfaction with the prompt settlement proposal and communication.
Approval granted for the auto accident claim, confirming the settlement offer and payment process.
Settlement payment was issued to the claimantâ€™s bank account, covering all approved damages and costs.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed following successful payment and claimant confirmation.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived for record-keeping and future reference.
